channel.title: U-Rune 3.0
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/vzuec0.jpg[/img][/center] Stay updated @ http://twitter.com/OfficialURune & http://www.youtube.com/user/Kihomura
[b]Combat (Melee)[/b] - Weapon timers. - Eating food adds a 1000ms delay onto your next attack. - Fixed the map freeze and client crash glitch. - Special attacks no longer hit over an NPC's health. -
[b]Combat (Ranged)[/b] - Ranged damage is calculated from your Ranged bonus and Ranged level. - Certain bows can old use certain arrows. (maple shortbow: adamant and lower, etc.) - Arrows drop if no damage is hit. - Arrows delete. - Special attacks no longer hit over an NPC's health. -
[b]Misc.[/b] - Perfect teleporting. - Teleportation glitch fixed. (players disappearing.) - Hans teleports you to 5 different areas. - One connection per-IP address. - Server is packaged for easy-access. - Almost perfect NPC drops. - Full item destroying. - Server now converted to a * look-alike. (this means absolutely no 'new' items, with the exception of skillcapes.) -
--
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/egpmqr.jpg[/img]
YouTube video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DMNanvKOtj8 [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/u965z.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/34e9p8j.jpg[/img]
YouTube video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=41O5I7eU0ds&feature=channel_page [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/ina4xz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/mlhuz8.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2du9oyd.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/28k69ag.jpg[/img]

@gon3d34d123 wrote:

I love your work Kihomura, this is great- and I look forward to see the result when your done.

~
Linus

[quote=“Telenim, post:32, topic:281424”][quote]U-Rune 3.0 will not be released, and you will not get it if you ask for it, the server will not be fully developed for a while.

[/quote][/quote]

This source has already ben released when it was blank. And I think thats what Umah is coding in.
I code in that source evry now and then when im bored…
